typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		i2 as string,
		{# Sociedad Nueva} as string,
		{# Sociedad Anterior} as string,
		{ID SAG Nueva} as string,
		{ID SAG Anterior} as string,
		DRV_Nva as string,
		DRV as string,
		{Descripción UEN} as string,
		{Descripcion UEN Corto} as string,
		{Descripción SAG} as string,
		Esquema as string,
		Estado as string,
		Tipo as string,
		{Distribución} as string,
		{Puerto Expedición} as string,
		Zona as string,
		Agencia as string,
		{Sub Agencia} as string,
		Tipo_Inv as string,
		OrigenJDA as string,
		DestinoJDA as string,
		{Descripción Destino} as string,
		{Tipo Distribución} as string,
		Op as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SourceXLSXLocation
TrimColumns select(mapColumn(
		I2 = i2,
		NSociedadNueva = {# Sociedad Nueva},
		NSociedadAnterior = {# Sociedad Anterior},
		IDSAGNueva = {ID SAG Nueva},
		IDSAGAnterior = {ID SAG Anterior},
		DRVNva = DRV_Nva,
		DRV,
		DescripcionUEN = {Descripción UEN},
		DescripcionUENCorto = {Descripcion UEN Corto},
		DescripcionSAG = {Descripcion UEN Corto},
		Esquema,
		Estado,
		Tipo,
		Distribucion = {Distribución},
		PuertoExpedicion = {Distribución},
		Zona,
		Agencia,
		SubAgencia = {Sub Agencia},
		TipoInv = Tipo_Inv,
		OrigenJDA,
		DestinoJDA,
		DescripcionDestino = {Descripción Destino},
		{TipoDistribución} = {Tipo Distribución}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
SourceXLSXLocation derive(i2 = trim(i2),
		{# Sociedad Nueva} = trim({# Sociedad Nueva}),
		{# Sociedad Anterior} = trim({# Sociedad Anterior}),
		{ID SAG Nueva} = trim({ID SAG Nueva}),
		{ID SAG Anterior} = trim({ID SAG Anterior}),
		DRV_Nva = trim(DRV_Nva),
		DRV = trim(DRV),
		{Descripción UEN} = trim({Descripción UEN}),
		{Descripcion UEN Corto} = trim({Descripcion UEN Corto}),
		{Descripción SAG} = trim({Descripción SAG}),
		Esquema = trim(Esquema),
		Estado = trim(Estado),
		Tipo = trim(Tipo),
		{Distribución} = trim({Distribución}),
		{Puerto Expedición} = trim({Puerto Expedición}),
		Zona = trim(Zona),
		Agencia = trim(Agencia),
		{Sub Agencia} = trim({Sub Agencia}),
		Tipo_Inv = trim(Tipo_Inv),
		OrigenJDA = trim(OrigenJDA),
		DestinoJDA = trim(DestinoJDA),
		{Tipo Distribución} = trim({Tipo Distribución}),
		Op = trim(Op)) ~> TrimColumns
SelectColumns sink(input(
		i2 as string,
		NSociedadNueva as string,
		NSociedadAnterior as string,
		IDSAGNueva as string,
		IDSAGAnterior as string,
		DRVNva as string,
		DRV as string,
		DescripcionUEN as string,
		DescripcionUENCorto as string,
		Esquema as string,
		Estado as string,
		Tipo as string,
		Distribucion as string,
		Zona as string,
		Agencia as string,
		SubAgencia as string,
		TipoInv as string,
		OrigenJDA as string,
		DestinoJDA as string,
		DescripcionDestino as string,
		{TipoDistribución} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	mapColumn(
		i2 = I2,
		NSociedadNueva,
		NSociedadAnterior,
		IDSAGNueva,
		IDSAGAnterior,
		DRVNva,
		DRV,
		DescripcionUEN,
		DescripcionUENCorto,
		Esquema,
		Estado,
		Tipo,
		Distribucion,
		Zona,
		Agencia,
		SubAgencia,
		TipoInv,
		OrigenJDA,
		DestinoJDA,
		DescripcionDestino,
		{TipoDistribución}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> DestinationSynapseDestination

source(output(
		Material as string,
		I2 as string,
		{Texto breve de material} as string,
		Marca as string,
		Cupo as string,
		Color as string,
		{Tipo de Envase} as string,
		{Cupo Agrupado} as string,
		Factor as string,
		{Cajas x Tarima} as string,
		Destino as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SourceXLSXPacking
TrimColumns select(mapColumn(
		Material,
		I2,
		TextoBreveDeMaterial = {Texto breve de material},
		Marca,
		Cupo,
		Color,
		TipoDeEnvase = {Tipo de Envase},
		CupoAgrupado = {Cupo Agrupado},
		Factor,
		CajaPorTarima = {Cajas x Tarima},
		Destino
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
SourceXLSXPacking derive(Material = trim(Material),
		I2 = trim(I2),
		{Texto breve de material} = trim({Texto breve de material}),
		Marca = trim({Marca}),
		Cupo = trim({Cupo}),
		Color = trim(Color),
		{Tipo de Envase} = trim({Tipo de Envase}),
		{Cupo Agrupado} = trim({Cupo Agrupado}),
		Factor = trim(Factor),
		{Cajas x Tarima} = trim({Cajas x Tarima}),
		Destino = trim(Destino)) ~> TrimColumns
SelectColumns sink(input(
		Material as string,
		I2 as string,
		TextoBreveDeMaterial as string,
		Marca as string,
		Cupo as string,
		Color as string,
		TipoDeEnvase as string,
		CupoAgrupado as string,
		Factor as string,
		CajaPorTarima as string,
		Destino as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	mapColumn(
		Material,
		I2,
		TextoBreveDeMaterial,
		Marca,
		Cupo,
		Color,
		TipoDeEnvase,
		CupoAgrupado,
		Factor,
		CajaPorTarima,
		Destino
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> DestinationSynapseMaterial

source(output(
		{Cl.documento compras} as string,
		{Documento compras} as string,
		Proveedor as string,
		{Posición} as string,
		Material as string,
		{Texto breve} as string,
		{Cantidad de pedido} as string,
		{Unidad medida pedido} as string,
		Centro as string,
		{Almacén} as string,
		Entrega as string,
		{Stat.tot.mov.mcía.} as string,
		{Fecha de entrega} as string,
		Column_14 as string,
		{Clase de movimiento1} as string,
		{Documento material1} as string,
		Cantidad1 as string,
		Lote1 as string,
		{Fe.contabilización1} as string,
		Column_20 as string,
		{Clase de movimiento2} as string,
		{Documento material2} as string,
		Cantidad2 as string,
		Lote2 as string,
		{Fe.contabilización2} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SourceXLSXTranStatus
SourceXLSXTranStatus select(mapColumn(
		ClDocuCompras = {Cl.documento compras},
		DocuCompras = {Documento compras},
		Proveedor,
		Posicion = {Posición},
		Material,
		TextoBreve = {Texto breve},
		CantidadPedido = {Cantidad de pedido},
		UnidadMedidaPedido = {Unidad medida pedido},
		Centro,
		Almacen = {Almacén},
		Entrega,
		StaTotMovMercancia = {Stat.tot.mov.mcía.},
		FechaEntrega = {Fecha de entrega},
		ClaseMovimiento1 = {Clase de movimiento1},
		DocuMaterial1 = {Documento material1},
		Cantidad1,
		Lote1,
		FeContabilizacion1 = {Fe.contabilización1},
		ClaseMovimiento2 = {Clase de movimiento2},
		DocuMaterial2 = {Documento material2},
		Cantidad2,
		Lote2,
		FeContabilizacion2 = {Fe.contabilización2}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
SelectColumns derive(ClDocuCompras = trim(ClDocuCompras),
		DocuCompras = trim(DocuCompras),
		Proveedor = trim(Proveedor),
		Posicion = trim(Posicion),
		Material = trim(Material),
		TextoBreve = trim(TextoBreve),
		CantidadPedido = trim(CantidadPedido),
		UnidadMedidaPedido = trim(UnidadMedidaPedido),
		Centro = trim(Centro),
		Almacen = trim(Almacen),
		Entrega = trim(Entrega),
		StaTotMovMercancia = trim(StaTotMovMercancia),
		FechaEntrega = trim(FechaEntrega),
		ClaseMovimiento1 = trim(ClaseMovimiento1),
		DocuMaterial1 = trim(DocuMaterial1),
		Cantidad1 = trim(Cantidad1),
		Lote1 = trim(Lote1),
		FeContabilizacion1 = trim(FeContabilizacion1),
		ClaseMovimiento2 = trim(ClaseMovimiento2),
		DocuMaterial2 = trim(DocuMaterial2),
		Cantidad2 = trim(Cantidad2),
		Lote2 = trim(Lote2),
		FeContabilizacion2 = trim(FeContabilizacion2)) ~> TrimColumns
TrimColumns sink(input(
		ClDocuCompras as string,
		DocuCompras as string,
		Proveedor as string,
		Posicion as string,
		Material as string,
		TextoBreve as string,
		CantidadPedido as string,
		UnidadMedidaPedido as string,
		Centro as string,
		Almacen as string,
		Entrega as string,
		StaTotMovMercancia as string,
		FechaEntrega as string,
		ClaseMovimiento1 as string,
		DocuMaterial1 as string,
		Cantidad1 as string,
		Lote1 as string,
		FeContabilizacion1 as string,
		ClaseMovimiento2 as string,
		DocuMaterial2 as string,
		Cantidad2 as string,
		Lote2 as string,
		FeContabilizacion2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> DestintarionSynapseTrans

source(output(
		{Pto.expedic./Pto.recepción} as string,
		{Denominación1} as string,
		{Destinatario mcía.} as string,
		Nombre1 as string,
		{Nº de transporte} as string,
		{Agente servicios} as string,
		Nombre2 as string,
		Entrega as string,
		{Posición} as string,
		{Tipo de posición} as string,
		{Denominación2} as string,
		Material as string,
		{Texto breve material} as string,
		{Cantidad entrega} as string,
		{Unidad medida base} as string,
		{Fe.mov.mcía.real} as string,
		{Documento modelo} as string,
		{Nº de pedido} as string,
		{Creado el} as string,
		{Identif.externa 1} as string,
		{Identif.externa 2} as string,
		{ID tracking transp.} as string,
		{Clase expedición} as string,
		{Denominación3} as string,
		{Ruta p.transporte} as string,
		{Denominación4} as string,
		{Fe.planif.registro} as string,
		{Stat.tot.mov.mcía.} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SourceXLSXTrans
SourceXLSXTrans select(mapColumn(
		PtoExpedicPtoRecepcion = {Pto.expedic./Pto.recepción},
		Denominacion1 = {Denominación1},
		DestinatarioMercancia = {Destinatario mcía.},
		Nombre1,
		NTransporte = {Nº de transporte},
		AgenteServicios = {Agente servicios},
		Nombre2,
		Entrega,
		Posicion = {Posición},
		TipoPosicion = {Tipo de posición},
		Denominacion2 = {Denominación2},
		Material,
		TextoBreveMaterial = {Texto breve material},
		CantidadEntrega = {Cantidad entrega},
		UnidadMedidaBase = {Unidad medida base},
		FeMovMercanciaReal = {Fe.mov.mcía.real},
		DocumentoModelo = {Documento modelo},
		NPedido = {Nº de pedido},
		Creado = {Creado el},
		IdentiExterna1 = {Identif.externa 1},
		IdentiExterna2 = {Identif.externa 2},
		IDTrackingTransp = {ID tracking transp.},
		ClaseExpedicion = {Clase expedición},
		Denominacion3 = {Denominación3},
		RutaPTransporte = {Ruta p.transporte},
		Denominacion4 = {Denominación4},
		FePlanifRegistro = {Fe.planif.registro},
		StaTotMovMercancia = {Stat.tot.mov.mcía.}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
SelectColumns derive(PtoExpedicPtoRecepcion = trim(PtoExpedicPtoRecepcion),
		Denominacion1 = trim(Denominacion1),
		DestinatarioMercancia = trim(DestinatarioMercancia),
		Nombre1 = trim(Nombre1),
		NTransporte = trim(NTransporte),
		AgenteServicios = trim(AgenteServicios),
		Nombre2 = trim(Nombre2),
		Entrega = trim(Entrega),
		Posicion = trim(Posicion),
		TipoPosicion = trim(TipoPosicion),
		Denominacion2 = trim(Denominacion2),
		Material = trim(Material),
		TextoBreveMaterial = trim(TextoBreveMaterial),
		CantidadEntrega = trim(CantidadEntrega),
		UnidadMedidaBase = trim(UnidadMedidaBase),
		FeMovMercanciaReal = trim(FeMovMercanciaReal),
		DocumentoModelo = trim(DocumentoModelo),
		NPedido = trim(NPedido),
		Creado = trim(Creado),
		IdentiExterna1 = trim(IdentiExterna1),
		IdentiExterna2 = trim(IdentiExterna2),
		IDTrackingTransp = trim(IDTrackingTransp),
		ClaseExpedicion = trim(ClaseExpedicion),
		Denominacion3 = trim(Denominacion3),
		RutaPTransporte = trim(RutaPTransporte),
		Denominacion4 = trim(Denominacion4),
		FePlanifRegistro = trim(FePlanifRegistro),
		StaTotMovMercancia = trim(StaTotMovMercancia)) ~> TrimColumns
TrimColumns sink(input(
		PtoExpedicPtoRecepcion as string,
		Denominacion1 as string,
		DestinatarioMercancia as string,
		Nombre1 as string,
		NTransporte as string,
		AgenteServicios as string,
		Nombre2 as string,
		Entrega as string,
		Posicion as string,
		TipoPosicion as string,
		Denominacion2 as string,
		Material as string,
		TextoBreveMaterial as string,
		CantidadEntrega as string,
		UnidadMedidaBase as string,
		FeMovMercanciaReal as string,
		DocumentoModelo as string,
		NPedido as string,
		Creado as string,
		IdentiExterna1 as string,
		IdentiExterna2 as string,
		IDTrackingTransp as string,
		ClaseExpedicion as string,
		Denominacion3 as string,
		RutaPTransporte as string,
		Denominacion4 as string,
		FePlanifRegistro as string,
		StaTotMovMercancia as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> DestintarionSynapseTrans

source(output(
		{Documento compras} as string,
		{Número de necesidad} as string,
		{Nombre del proveedor} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SourceXLSXTransme2n
SourceXLSXTransme2n select(mapColumn(
		DocumentoCompras = {Documento compras},
		NumNecesidad = {Número de necesidad},
		NombreProveedor = {Nombre del proveedor}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
SelectColumns derive(DocumentoCompras = trim(DocumentoCompras),
		NumNecesidad = trim(NumNecesidad),
		NombreProveedor = trim(NombreProveedor)) ~> TrimColumns
TrimColumns sink(input(
		DocumentoCompras as string,
		NumNecesidad as string,
		NombreProveedor as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> DestintarionSynapseTransme2n

source(output(
		ClDocuCompras as string,
		DocuCompras as string,
		Proveedor as string,
		Posicion as string,
		Material as string,
		TextoBreve as string,
		CantidadPedido as string,
		UnidadMedidaPedido as string,
		Centro as string,
		Almacen as string,
		Entrega as string,
		StaTotMovMercancia as string,
		FechaEntrega as string,
		ClaseMovimiento1 as string,
		DocuMaterial1 as string,
		Cantidad1 as string,
		Lote1 as string,
		FeContabilizacion1 as string,
		ClaseMovimiento2 as string,
		DocuMaterial2 as string,
		Cantidad2 as string,
		Lote2 as string,
		FeContabilizacion2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT *\nFROM ext.mex_log_reverlog_trans_status\nWHERE TRIM(UPPER(StaTotMovMercancia)) LIKE \'C\'',
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> SourceSynapseTranStatus
source(output(
		PtoExpedicPtoRecepcion as string,
		Denominacion1 as string,
		DestinatarioMercancia as string,
		Nombre1 as string,
		NTransporte as string,
		AgenteServicios as string,
		Nombre2 as string,
		Entrega as string,
		Posicion as string,
		TipoPosicion as string,
		Denominacion2 as string,
		Material as string,
		TextoBreveMaterial as string,
		CantidadEntrega as string,
		UnidadMedidaBase as string,
		FeMovMercanciaReal as string,
		DocumentoModelo as string,
		NPedido as string,
		Creado as string,
		IdentiExterna1 as string,
		IdentiExterna2 as string,
		IDTrackingTransp as string,
		ClaseExpedicion as string,
		Denominacion3 as string,
		RutaPTransporte as string,
		Denominacion4 as string,
		FePlanifRegistro as string,
		StaTotMovMercancia as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,

	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> SourceSynapseTrans

		i2 as string,
		NSociedadNueva as string,

source(output(
		EtiquetasFila as string,
		SumaTarimas as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> SourceSynapseTarima
source(output(
		DocumentoCompras as string,
		NumNecesidad as string,
		NombreProveedor as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> SourceSyanpseTransITME2N
SourceSynapseTranStatus derive(Centro = replace(Centro, 'AL', 'FL')) ~> ReplaceCentro
SourceSynapseTrans select(mapColumn(
		PtoExpedicPtoRecepcion,
		Denominacion1,
		DestinatarioMercancia,
		Nombre1,
		NTransporte,
		AgenteServicios,
		Nombre2,
		Entrega,
		Posicion,
		TipoPosicion,
		Denominacion2,
		Material,
		TextoBreveMaterial,
		CantidadEntrega,
		UnidadMedidaBase,
		FeMovMercanciaReal,
		DocumentoModelo,
		NPedido,
		Creado,
		IdentiExterna1,
		IdentiExterna2,
		IDTrackingTransp,
		ClaseExpedicion,
		Denominacion3,
		RutaPTransporte,
		Denominacion4,
		FePlanifRegistro,
		StaTotMovMercancia
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectTransColumns
SourceSynapseDestination select(mapColumn(
		Agencia_Des = IDSAGNueva,
		Centro_Des = DescripcionUENCorto,
		OP_Des = Tipo
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDestinationColumns
SourceSynapseMaterial select(mapColumn(
		Material_Material = Material,
		TipoDeEnvase_Material = TipoDeEnvase,
		Produccion_Material = Destino
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectMaterialColumns
SourceSynapseTarima select(mapColumn(
		EtiquetasFila_Tarima = EtiquetasFila,
		SumaTarimas_Materia = SumaTarimas
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectTarimaColumns
ReplaceCentro, SelectDestinationColumns join(trim(upper(Centro)) == trim(upper(Centro_Des)),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LeftJoinTranStatusAndDestination
SourceSyanpseTransITME2N select(mapColumn(
		DocumentoCompras_TransITME2N = DocumentoCompras,
		Folio_TransITME2N = NumNecesidad,
		NombreProveedor_TransITME2N = NombreProveedor
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectTransITME2NColumns
LeftJoinTranStatusAndDestination, SourceSyanpseTransITME2N join(trim(upper(DocuCompras)) == trim(upper(DocumentoCompras)),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinNewTranStatusAndTransITME2N
JoinNewTranStatusAndTransITME2N, SelectTransColumns join(trim(upper(DocuCompras)) == trim(upper(DocumentoModelo)),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinNewTransStatus2AndTrans
JoinNewTransStatus2AndTrans select(mapColumn(
		ClDocuCompras,
		DocuCompras,
		Proveedor,
		Posicion = SourceSynapseTranStatus@Posicion,
		Material = SourceSynapseTranStatus@Material,
		TextoBreve,
		CantidadPedido,
		UnidadMedidaPedido,
		Centro,
		Almacen,
		Entrega = SourceSynapseTranStatus@Entrega,
		StaTotMovMercancia = SourceSynapseTranStatus@StaTotMovMercancia,
		FechaEntrega,
		ClaseMovimiento1,
		DocuMaterial1,
		Cantidad1,
		Lote1,
		FeContabilizacion1,
		ClaseMovimiento2,
		DocuMaterial2,
		Cantidad2,
		Lote2,
		FeContabilizacion2,
		Agencia_Des,
		OP_Des,
		DocumentoCompras_TransITME2N = DocumentoCompras,
		Folio_TransITME2N = NumNecesidad,
		NombreProveedor__TransITME2N = NombreProveedor,
		StaTotMovMercancia_Trans = SelectTransColumns@StaTotMovMercancia
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectNewTransStatusColums
SelectNewTransStatusColums sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	mapColumn(
		ClDocuCompras,
		DocuCompras,
		Proveedor,
		Posicion,
		Material,
		TextoBreve,
		CantidadPedido,
		UnidadMedidaPedido,
		Centro,
		Almacen,
		Entrega,
		StaTotMovMercancia,
		FechaEntrega,
		ClaseMovimiento1,
		DocuMaterial1,
		Cantidad1,
		Lote1,
		FeContabilizacion1,
		ClaseMovimiento2,
		DocuMaterial2,
		Cantidad2,
		Lote2,
		FeContabilizacion2,
		Agencia_Des,
		OP_Des,
		DocumentoCompras_TransITME2N,
		Folio_TransITME2N,
		NombreProveedor__TransITME2N,
		StaTotMovMercancia_Trans
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> DestinationSyanpseFinalTranStatus
